name: Hotel Kertha Denpasar
address: Jl. Kertha Bedulu V No.29, Sidakarya, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80224, Indonesia
review 1: I have been living at Hotel Kertha for half a year and experienced a great time. Great location to explore Bali from and a big and clean room. A warm atmosphere around the house and polite staff.
review 2: Scammer. We booked and paid online and they refuse to give us the room. Part of the OYO-Group. Their business model is to set low prices (3-5 USD) and then not give the guests their room, because too cheap. After that they want to! negotiate! about a refund! WHAT?! SCAM!!
review 3: This Hotel is part of the OYO scam sheme. Don't book your stay here. Online they advertise price from 4-6$ dollar a night and when you arrive they will charge you 400.000 IDR a night, if they even have a room available. Scam. Scam. Scam.
review 4: Had a wonderful time staying here for half a year. The rooms were nice and clean and the family and staff are super nice. Would stay here again.
review 5:
Wonderfull hotel, my go to place when I visit Bali.

Friendly staff, always helpfull!

Good and friendly environment always feels like coming home.

name: Sugiras Living
address: Banjar Suwung Kangin, Jl. Kertha Bedulu No.1A, Sidakarya, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80224, Indonesia
review 1: The rooms are clean and well kept. The staff are friendly to chat with. There is breakfast that can be eaten in the lovely courtyard.
review 2: We‚Äôve had very nice two nights there. Owner and all staff were ver nice and helpful with any question we‚Äôve had. It‚Äôs a bit in a middle of nowhere, like a lovely oasis, but with nice massage places around and with grab is easy to get anywhere you need. We booked standard room, but it was not a problem to pay a bit more and get remote control for the air con. Really lovely place!
review 3: The owner was very accommodating. She helped us to arrange rental motor bike and grab taxi.the place was quiet peaceful and relaxing that goods for couple. They always prepared us a very nice breakfast. Feels like homeüòä
review 4: Quite a pleasant surprise to visit Denspasar and stay at the Sugiras Living! I am staying here for about 10 days and I already like the Bali weather, people of Bali and staying at the Sugiras Living. The place is neat and tidy. Ms Devi is an absolute delight to meet! She is so kind, polite, sweet and soft voice, and asked me about my food preferences! She is caring and beautiful family! I am already amazed by the Bali culture! The neighborhood is quite and bed is comfortable! Shower was warm and room is good size. I left the door open because it is very homely place! The check in process was efficient! Ms Devi had arranged a shuttle! The driver is polite and very helpful. Ms Devi speaks fluent English. She offered directions for the beach, also. I highly recommend staying here. I am enjoying learning about Balinese culture and religion! The whole place is quite charming and Balinese prayer items are here! Beautiful garden, too.
review 5: Hosts are very generous, helpful and friendly. I enjoyed being away from the touristy areas, rooms are very clean and comfortable. Great prices and they accommodated my dietary needs in their complimentary breakfast. What more can you want? Will absolutely stay again!

name: OYO 90823 Casa Jupiter Shine

review 1: Very bad experience. I promise i will not order via OYO anymore. Enough only once.
review 2: Very bad. Never come again . because owner asking more money
review 3: Our 1st home in Bali, loved it

name: PeTo Steakhouse
address: Jl. Tukad Balian Jl. Wirasatya VII, Sidakarya, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
What a hidden gem! Must try when visiting Sanur! Great food and steak quality, great service and lovely atmosphere! Also the caramelized desserts (apple, pineapple, etc.) are special! Add some affordable local wine and the dinner date is perfect! :)
Termia Kasih to the team! :)
review 2: A very comfortable place to eat for alone, alone, or with family. With a very comfortable garden arrangement, by providing a variety of steaks that are very varied according to your taste. For those here, you can choose your own sauce, and eat a companion according to your taste, which is served on a hotplate. For food served with fairly large portions. Providing a variety of fruit juices according to your taste. Providing desserts in the form of Ice Puter. Which I highly recommend.
review 3:
very yummy indonesian food.
Nice place with nice vibe. I like it very much.
already been to this place 3 times. and with affordable prices.
Option of self service also. Plenty of space to chill.
review 4: Pork steak is ok, beef tenderloin steak could be good, but it came in raw. We've cut the meat but the plate is not hot enough to cook it properly. It was disgusting that the blood was coming out from the meat.
review 5:
PeTo (Pitu = 7)
This place is extraordinary. They have 3 kind of service, self service half service and total service. I choose the self service and it's a good experience for me.
This steakhouse over some 'rare' menu, because I rarely found the menu at the other steakhouse. The price is various depends on the menu.
The food is delicious and the place is wonderful with a lot of flowers just like a garden.

Absolutely I will come for my T-Bone next time üòé

name: OYO 1684 Marina Suite Apartment Bali
address: Jl. Tukad Balian No.191, Sidakarya, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80224, Indonesia
review 1:
I visit this room May 2021.
And I gave rating now, because I don't want other people had same experience like me.

Staying here definitely not worth it, unless they had full renovation and change the staffs.

The room was completely dirty.
There was some hair and footprints on the floor, blood stain on the bed, leaking water from the tap, room smells smoke and the walll was moldy.

We request to change room, but the other room was not better. Still dirty and not well maintained.

When we want to ask, are there better room instead of this one, the receptionist go home, because she said her shift was over.
So we have to wait for 10 minutes, for another staff coming.

After the next shift staff coming, we have to explain our problem again. Since the previous shift tell her nothing.

Then they offer us another room but this time with 'upgrade' because this room was twice the price, but we don't need to pay a cent.

When we look at the room, we are some kind of relieved, because this room was far better from the first and second one, but unfortunately this room was not cleaned yet.
Since this room was not used for a long time, so they have to change the sheet, fix the air conditioner, and some cleaning here and there.
And it takes 2 hrs minimum to clean all of it.

Finally, we decided to cancel the book, but the receptionist can't help with the refund.
And so we leave with disappointment and book another hotel near Sanur.

Although we can't refund, but I don't really mind. because the stay will not be worth it.

Worst experience ever.

name: Andewi Guest House Denpasar RedPartner
address: Jl. Mertasari.20A, Sidakarya, Sanur, Denpasar Selatan, Denpasar City, Bali 80224, Indonesia
review 1:
It was an unpleasant stay. Price is very high compared to the dirty place you get.
Do not expect hospitality.

They just rent out the space, cleanliness is excluded, UNLESS you complain, they will clean up (but not clean enough).

You need to always ask for basic cleanliness, it was a messy management, I do hope the owner is taking care of the place in the future.
Rust is everywhere on every water tap (I did not use the sink in the bathroom at all, not even to wash my hands), they cleaned the sink after few days after I complained loudly for 3 days straight upon arriving (otherwise they do not care at all), but still not clean enough.
The water kettle was also rusty, the inside part was black, and they cleaned it after I complained for 1 week.
I don't think they ever clean the curtains, probably since years ago.

Complaint must be addressed to the cleaner, to the marketing lady, to the management - yes there were 3 persons whom I need to contact - super draining. And there was none to take care about how the guests are feeling, because I tried to negotiate few times about the price I paid, the marketing lady was telling me "it's fixed price" and it will be more draining for me to ask for refund/ any discount due to unpleasant stay, because those 3 persons are not a decision maker.

Additionally, the cleaner do not know how to clean.
Even if I precisely mentioned what to be cleaned (it was written by WhatsApp point by point), they asked me "is this clean enough", well it is not but it's not my job to tell them how to clean, or... they forgot to clean, so basically they don't know what they don't know.

The only thing that made me stay is the space, the studio is spacious enough. But it took me almost 10 days out of the place during 1 month stay, and if I had more money I would check out earlier as I could not sleep most days, the location is noisy during day time (I think there was a local warehouse doing renovation all day long including saturdays in the back of rooms) and also during night time there was a loud noise from cafe around, until 2-3 AM.

Search for somewhere else to stay, save your money.
review 2: I love it here and the family is very nice. Very clean rooms also and the two Pomeranians are so cute.
review 3: Huge room, more than expected. so comfy and has private parking lot.

name: The Kings Villas & Spa Bali
address: Jl. Tukad Balian No.99, Sidakarya, Sanur, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80224, Indonesia
review 1: Stayed here for 3 weeks in 2019. Home from home experience with the added luxury of private pool. I bedroom villa very spacious and decorated in Balinese style. Quirky private outside bathroom. Staff were fantastic couldn't do enough for you made you feel very welcome. About a 30 minute walk to town centre or a 10 minute cab ride which cost around  ¬£2.00 on average. So if you want to be on the door step for beach restaurants etc this may not be ideal did not bother us as the accomodation, ambience more then compensated. Loved it so much that we are hopefully returning for a month over Christmas and New year.
review 2:
Amazing service from the awesome staff of Kings villa. Very organized checkin/ checkout process, delicious meals, awesome room service and candle light dinner and decor. Timely pickup and drop from airport. Spacious rooms with proper ventilation and clean pools.
Only suggestion is that there were no fans in the room which sometimes is a problem on a hot day as AC takes time to cool.
review 3:
Amazing place to visit!!!! Peaceful Place it‚Äôs! Will ensure will visit this place quite often. Tremendous amount of work people putting together ensure we get the right service offering.

Food Ambience Pool Everything is just awesome:)
review 4: Belum stay, cuman datang untuk inspection pilih2 villa for wedding. The manager and Mba Penny are so friendly and  warm. I believe that to those who stay here will have a very good experience especially for the honeymoon couple, they have one bedroom villa that the design is so amazing. Very recommended
review 5:
